title: List of chancellors of Germany by time in office - Wikipedia
snippet: This is a list of chancellors of Germany by time in office from 1867 to 2025, including all the predecessor states of the current Federal Republic of Germany. This is based on the difference between dates; if counted by number of calendar days, ...

title: Germany's chancellors
snippet: Germany has had nine chancellors since 1949: eight male, one female. Here's an overview of the people and their legacies.

title: List of Chancellors of Germany (1871-2025)
snippet: Willy Brandt, chancellor from 1969 to 1974, is remembered for his Ostpolitik policy, aiming to improve relations with East Germany and Eastern Europe. For these efforts, he was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1971.

title: German Chancellors and Presidents - Behind the Name
snippet: The office was established in 1919 during the Weimar Republic and re-established in 1949 in West Germany. In German the Chancellor was originally called Reichskanzler meaning "imperial chancellor". Since 1949 the title is Bundeskanzler meaning "federal chancellor" (the first female chancellor, ...
